TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 、、 或 事件資料。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , or events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例說明自訂。The following example illustrates a customized . 藉由繼承類別，這個自訂的版本具有一般的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a normal . 變更建構函式中的各種屬性值會提供獨特的外觀。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因為屬性設定為 false，自訂的控制項也會覆寫方法，使節點可以展開和摺疊時按一下。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以這種方式自訂控制項可以使用整個組織中，以便輕鬆地提供一致的介面，而不需要在每個個別的專案中指定的控制項屬性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. [!code-cpp[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/CPP/treeviewcustomization.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/CS/treeviewcustomization.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/VB/treeviewcustomization.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例說明自訂。The following example illustrates a customized . 藉由繼承類別，這個自訂的版本具有一般的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a normal . 變更建構函式中的各種屬性值會提供獨特的外觀。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因為屬性設定為 false，自訂的控制項也會覆寫方法，使節點可以展開和摺疊時按一下。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以這種方式自訂控制項可以使用整個組織中，以便輕鬆地提供一致的介面，而不需要在每個個別的專案中指定的控制項屬性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例說明自訂。The following example illustrates a customized . 藉由繼承類別，這個自訂的版本具有一般的所有功能。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a normal . 變更建構函式中的各種屬性值時，會提供獨特的外觀。A unique appearance is provided by changing various property values in the constructor. 因為設為 false，自訂的控制項也會覆寫使節點可以展開和摺疊時按一下。Because is set to false, the customized control also overrides so that nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以這種方式自訂控制項可以使用整個組織中，以便輕鬆地提供一致的介面，而不需要在每個個別的專案中指定的控制項屬性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
